text: The 2036 Summer Olympics, officially known as the Games of the XXXVI Olympiad, is a forthcoming international multi-sport event. The winning bid for the host city might be announced between 2025 and 2029. Many cities want to host the 2036 Summer Olympics, including London, Doha and Ahmedabad. == References == Category:2036 Category:Summer Olympic Games Category:2030s in sports
title: 2036 Summer Olympics
